sentences.english: Nothing was heard in the room but the hurrying pen of the stripling.
sentences.chinese: 屋子裏悄然無聲，只有年輕人的筆匆忙劃過紙頁。

sentences.english: Modern submarines are very, very quiet.
sentences.chinese: 現代潛艇的航行是悄然無聲的。

sentences.english: Tracking wild animals requires great stealth.
sentences.chinese: 跟蹤野生動物必須悄然無聲。

sentences.english: You wake up and time has slipped away.
sentences.chinese: 你醒來時間已經悄然無聲地溜走。

sentences.english: The teacher opened the door without a sound.
sentences.chinese: 老師悄然無聲地開了門。
跟蹤野豎動物必鴦悄然無聲。

sentences.english: The room was spotless and silent.
sentences.chinese: 廁所裏一塵不染，悄然無聲。

sentences.english: The risk of disaster quietly accumulates.
sentences.chinese: 災害風險的累積是悄然無聲的。
